QuestData.Title: Righteous Fury
QuestData.Description: The devastators bombarding our forces prevent us from advancing any further. I can only protect us from their blasts for so long.$B$BChampion, you must pierce their lines and remove the barriers protecting the devastators.$B$BIf you can destroy the anchors that maintain the shields, I can cleanse them from afar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Prophet Velen at the Crown of Destruction.
QuestData.RewardText: We may yet stand a chance.
